short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives merchants the freedom to accept payments with alternative payment gateways

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrate Pay gives merchants and providers the freedom to accept payments with alternative payment gateways.

Integrate Pay connects point of sale systems (such as Jane App) to your favorite payment gateway (such as Authorize.Net). This enables you to save money on fees by accepting payments outside of your point of sale system.

Integrate Pay offers some features to save you time and money:
- Copies auto-detected customer name and payment amount into the destination terminal.
- Can search for a saved customer card in the destination terminal, and auto-fill the form with the details for that saved customer.
- Connects to USB card readers, allowing swipes to be parsed in and populate the terminal payment form automatically based on the card information.

Integrate Pay is a new extension, so please contact us if you have feature requests, point of sale systems to add, or terminals to add. We're also happy to help if you're experiencing any problems in using Integrate Pay.

Integrate Pay is a paid extension, costing $5 per month. We are pleased to offer a 30 day free trial, with no credit card required to try it. If it succeeds in saving you money, please consider subscribing.
